hooks.prompt: Run /get-pr-details to fetch current PR information and display it to the user.

hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' | { read file_path; if echo "$file_path" | grep -q '\.py$'; then ruff format --quiet "$file_path" 2>/dev/null; elif echo "$file_path" | grep -q '\.json$'; then tmp=$(mktemp) && jq . "$file_path" > "$tmp" 2>/dev/null && mv "$tmp" "$file_path"; fi; }

hooks.prompt: If there are uncommitted changes, run /git-commit to stage, commit, and push them.
